<h3 id="X21454">X(21454)&nbsp;=&nbsp;TRILINEAR POLE OF THE PERSPECTRIX OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND INCIRCLE-CIRCLES</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (3*a+b+c)*(a+b-c)*(a-b+c)  :  :
<p class="bold">
X(21454) = 3*X(2)-4*X(5437)
</p>

<p>
X(21454) = isogonal conjugate of X(34820)<br>
X(21454) = cevapoint  of X(1449) and X(3361)<br>
X(21454) = crossdifference of every pair of points on line X(663)X(4524)<br>
X(21454) = anticomplement of X(18228)<br>
X(21454) = trilinear pole of the line {4778, 16533}<br>
X(21454) = X(17810)-of-intouch triangle<br>
X(21454) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 9965, 144), (2, 20059, 329), (7, 5226, 4654), (57, 226, 5435), (57, 4654, 3911), (63, 9776, 2), (142, 3928, 5273), (142, 5273, 2), (226, 5435, 2), (329, 3306, 2), (2094, 9776, 63), (3911, 5226, 2), (4114, 4654, 7), (5249, 5744, 2), (5328, 6692, 2), (5437, 18228, 2)<br>
